## Scope
- Subject: LSA/PICC compliance & audit method (spec-level)
- Excludes: runtime, prompts, private thresholds

## Tasks
- [ ] Draft public narrative (method only)
- [ ] Host as dated public doc (e.g., repo/docs or external with timestamp)

- [ ] Internal review by Legal & CTO

## Notes
Ensure examples are **synthetic** and non-proprietary.
